DDL:
create or replace TABLE DISTRIBUTION_METADATA (
	"metadata_version" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"name" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"version" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"summary" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"description" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"description_content_type" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"author" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"author_email" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"maintainer" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"maintainer_email" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"license" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"keywords" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"classifiers" VARIANT,
	"platform" VARIANT,
	"home_page" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"download_url" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"requires_python" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"requires" VARIANT,
	"provides" VARIANT,
	"obsoletes" VARIANT,
	"requires_dist" VARIANT,
	"provides_dist" VARIANT,
	"obsoletes_dist" VARIANT,
	"requires_external" VARIANT,
	"project_urls" VARIANT,
	"uploaded_via" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"upload_time" NUMBER(38,0),
	"filename" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"size" NUMBER(38,0),
	"path" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"python_version" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"packagetype" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"comment_text" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"has_signature" BOOLEAN,
	"md5_digest" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"sha256_digest" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"blake2_256_digest" VARCHAR(16777216)
);

create or replace TABLE FILE_DOWNLOADS (
	"timestamp" NUMBER(38,0),
	"country_code" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"url" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"project" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"file" VARIANT,
	"details" VARIANT,
	"tls_protocol" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"tls_cipher" VARCHAR(16777216)
);
